title: Winter Olympics - Sochi 2014 - 180 Hrs - BBC - English - Slimoo
description:
Winter Olympics - Sport - Mp4 and Xvid - Slimoo

===================== NOTE - Please Read it WILL Help you =====================
 
 
These files are a mix of TVrips and BBC iPlayer downloads.

The BBC is a advert free station - 3 hours is 3 hours of events

The BBC jump from event to event at random 
So even the BBC listings are not 100% correct

If you go to http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/winter-olympics/2014/schedule/sports/figure-skating

Above link
Click event (Symbol lower on page)
Click Day
Should give you the time of event then see below

Most Part 01 of the day in this torrent start at 5 or 6am UK so it should give you a clue which parts you need

Part 01 starts between 5 and 6am UK time
Part 01 - 6 to 10am = Usually 4 hours long
Part 02 - 10 to 1pm = Usually 3 hours long
Part 03 - 1pm to 4pm = Usually 3 hours long
Part 04 - 4pm to 7pm = Usually 3 hours long
7pm Is the Today at the Games (Or Highlights as we call them)
 

The BBC had an issue with files 4 hours long
Many of Part 01 fail on download and need to be converted to Xvid or they will not play[/b] 

Key:
TVR = TVrip (Xvid)
IPR = iPlayer rip (Usually MP4)
(Note BBC has 2 files named - Part 01 - Now Renamed as 4 Parts)
 


 <a href="
http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/winter-olympics/2014/sports" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/winter-olympics/2014/sports</a>
